Hex Tips & Notes for BG3

Upcast: Casting Hex with a level 2 or higher spell slot doesn't grant any additional benefits. Hex only works with attacks that use Attack Rolls, eg. Eldritch Blast, but not Magic Missile or Fireball. Hex affects Ability Checks only, not Saving Throws nor Attack Rolls. The debuff is very situational to useless.
